scripts.examples:vite: concurrently --kill-others --names server,docs "pnpm run server" "pnpm -C examples/tatchi-docs dev"
scripts.examples:vite-iphone: concurrently --kill-others --names server,docs "pnpm run server:iphone" "pnpm -C examples/tatchi-docs dev:iphone"
scripts.server: pnpm -C examples/relay-server postgres:up && EXPECTED_ORIGIN=https://example.localhost EXPECTED_WALLET_ORIGIN=https://wallet.example.localhost pnpm -C examples/relay-server dev
scripts.server:3-relays: pnpm -C examples/relay-server postgres:up && EXPECTED_ORIGIN=https://example.localhost EXPECTED_WALLET_ORIGIN=https://wallet.example.localhost pnpm -C examples/relay-server dev:threshold:3relays
scripts.server:iphone: pnpm -C examples/relay-server postgres:up && EXPECTED_ORIGIN=https://pta-m4.local EXPECTED_WALLET_ORIGIN=https://pta-m4.local:8443 pnpm -C examples/relay-server dev
